sentences: In March 2007, Sano appeared in the Tokyo Broadcasting System Ai no Gekijō Sand Chronicles as Daigo Kitamura in his middle school years, and later in July he appeared in the drama Katagoshi no Koibito on the same channel.
In January 2008 he opened his official blog "Kaizō Keikaku" with Masataka Kubota.
In 2010 Sano's first lead film role was Ongakubito.
